front.title: Ad-hoc Resource Lists using SUBSCRIBE in SIMPLE

abstract.t: This document presents an extension to the Session InitiationProtocol (SIP)-Specific Event Notification mechanism for subscribingto a homogeneous list of resources. Instead of the subscribersending a SUBSCRIBE for each resource individually, the subscribercan define an ad-hoc resource list, subscribe to it, and maintain itâ€“ all within a single SUBSCRIBE dialog. Changes in the state of theresources are reported using the same dialog in any standard SIMPLEformat for conveying notifications for lists of resources orindividual resources and agreed during the SUBSCRIBE dialogestablishment.
